meanings: want, wish, hope, (formal) desire, (간절히) long (for / to do)

phrases.phrase: 익명을 원하는 한 사업가가 기부한 돈
meanings: the money donated by a businessman who wishes to remain anonymous

phrases.phrase: 당신은 원하는 것은 무리를 해서라도 손에 넣으려는 사람입니다.
meanings: B형에 관련된 표현 You are the type who gets what you want even if you have to wear yourself out.
